hedline.hl1: Fonar and HealthSouth Settle M.R.I. Dispute

abstract.p: Fonar Corp and HealthSouth Corp reportedly settle disagreement over what Fonar terms infringement of patented technology for magnetic resonance imaging; terms are not disclosed (S)

block.p: The Fonar Corporation in Melville (Nasdaq: FONR) announced a settlement with the HealthSouth Corporation to resolve a disagreement over what Fonar said was infringement of patented technology for magnetic resonance imaging, or M.R.I., which is a diagnostic tool for doctors. Terms were not disclosed.
Fonar, which owns the patents on the original open magnetic resonance imaging, has also reached settlements with Hitachi, Philips, Siemens, Toshiba, Elscint and Shimadzu.
